upgrade.0: CRIT Rate is increased by 4%. After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by 120% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.
upgrade.1: CRIT Rate is increased by 5%. After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by 150% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.

This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.

This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.

After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by 240% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.

upgrade.0: 暴击率提升4%；普通攻击造成元素伤害后，获得「裁叶」效果：普通攻击和元素战技造成的伤害提高，提高值相当于元素精通的120%。该效果在生效28次或12秒后消失，每12秒至多获得一次「裁叶」效果。

upgrade.4: 暴击率提升8%；普通攻击造成元素伤害后，获得「裁叶」效果：普通攻击和元素战技造成的伤害提高，提高值相当于元素精通的240%。该效果在生效28次或12秒后消失，每12秒至多获得一次「裁叶」效果。

upgrade.0: 会心率+4%。通常攻撃で元素ダメージを与えた後、「裁葉」効果を獲得し、通常攻撃および元素スキルによるダメージが元素熟知の120%分アップする。「裁葉」効果は28回発動または12秒後にクリアされ、12秒毎に1回のみ獲得できる。
